text: Yogen-sha wa kare-ra ni,`makotoni arra wa, taruto o anata gata no ue ni,-o to shite ninmei sa reta.' To itta. Kare-ra wa itta. `Kare ga doshite, watashi-tachi no o ni nareyou ka. Watashi-tachi koso, kare yori mo o ni fusawashi. Mata kare wa tomi ni mo megumarete inai.' Kare (yogen-sha) wa itta. `Arra wa, anata gata no ue ni kare o erabi, kare no chishiki to tairyoku o tsuyome rareta. Arra wa o kokoronikanau-sha ni, oken o sadzuke rareru. Arra wa atsu Shi ni shite zenchi de ara reru
